exchange-config.caption: 未来几日剔除休息时间
内部要货令（执行层2输入）
内部要货令（执行层1输入）

writer.idKeys: usercenter, ofh, xianh, chej, lingj, xiaohd,zhizlx

reader.sql: select dingdh,zzzx,lingjbh,yxbh,ddrq,shul,zfbj,hgbm,xianh,lyxt,usercenter,'0' as clzt,sysdate as cj_date,WENJMC,WENJLJ from ${dbSchemal4}in_wbddyg where 1=1
select whof,uw5anoseq,value,product,sysdate as sxdate,oclass,jsbs,csdate,codecen,lmp,wldid from sppv034 where JSBS='F'

select USERCENTER,YAOHLH,GYSDM,JIAOFJ,ZUIZSJ,ZUIWSJ,LINGJBH,DANW,YAOHSL,BAOZXH,UARL,UCXH,UCRL,UCGS,XIEHD,MUDD, DINGDH,KEHU,sysdate as cj_date,'0' as clzt,WENJMC,WENJLJ from ${dbSchemal4}IN_GEVP_YAOHL where 1=1
select liush, usercenter, cangkbh, lingjbh, danw, lingjsl, dingdzzlj, anqkcts, anqkc, to_char(kucsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') kucsj, kuaizlx from ${dbSchemal4}ck_kuckz where 1=1
SELECT USERCENTER, XIAOHD, LINGJBH, DAOHL, YICXHL, JILRQ ,'1' AS FLAG FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_LINGJXHB WHERE 1=1

SELECT ID, TCNO, UTNO, to_char(QIYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as QIYSJ, QIYD, MUDD,LUJDM, DINGHCJ, to_char(YUJDDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as YUJDDSJ, ZUISWLD, to_char(DAODWLDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as DAODWLDSJ, to_char(ZUIXYJDDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as ZUIXYJDDSJ, to_char(LAXZDDDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as LAXZDDDSJ, to_char(KAIXZDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as KAIXZDSJ, TCZT FROM ${dbSchemal4}XQJS_TC where 1=1

exchange-config.caption: 内部要货令(输出到执行层2，准备层)

reader.sql: SELECT YAOHLH, USERCENTER, XUNHBM, KANBKH, to_char(JIAOFJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as JIAOFJ, to_char(ZUIZSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIZSJ, to_char(ZUIWSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIWSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJMC, DANW, YAOHSL, BAOZXH,USXH, to_char(FAYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as FAYSJ, to_char(BEIHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as BEIHSJ, to_char(SHANGXSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHANGXSJ, CANGKBH, ZICKBH, XIEHD, MUDD, MUDDLX, YAOHLZT, DINGDH, SHENGBR, YAOHLSL, JIAOFLX, JIAOFZL, DAIJFSL, YAOHLLX, YAOHLLB, TONGBLSHQJ, BEIZ, XIAOHCH, TANGC, CHEX, CENG, SHIFGJ, SHIFSCBHD, SHIFDYUC, GONGYSDM, GONGYSMC, CHEJ, SHANGXFS, CHANX, KEH, PEISLB, SHIFLSK, to_char(YAOHLSCSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as YAOHLSCSJ, SHIFPZ, SUODPZ, PEIZLSSL, to_char(SHIJFYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHIJFYSJ, DINGDMXID FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAONBHL WHERE YAOHLLB='05' and YAOHLZT='01'

select usercenter, uth, to_char(utscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') utscsj, blh, xiehzt, tch, cangkbh, chengysdm, chengysmc, fayzsl, zhuangt, to_char(yujddsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') yujddsj, to_char(blscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') blscsj, dayzt, fayzmzdw, yuanuth, yuanblh, to_char(yanssj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') yanssj, shiftb, jiufqjzxh from ${dbSchemal4}ck_daohtzd where 1=1

select usercenter, ush, elh, ulh, blh, uth, cangkbh, zickbh, cangklx, kuwbh, yuanbqbh, gongysdm, gongysmc, gongyslx, chengysdm, chengysmc, fayzmzdw, pich, usxh, usrl, ucxh, ucrl, ucgs, lingjbh, lingjmc, danw, lingjsl, keyljsl, baozzt, zhuangtsx, ruklx, to_char(rukrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') rukrq, to_char(shixrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') shixrq, chanx, jingz, maoz, to_char(daysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') daysj, beiz, yansts, rkpjh, yclx, rwld, yuanckh, to_char(baofrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') baofrq, xiaohsl, fanxsl, tuihsl, to_char(caozsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') caozsj, caozybh, caozymc, cangkglyz from ${dbSchemal4}ck_usbq where 1=1

select yaohlh, usercenter, xunhbm, kanbkh, to_char(jiaofj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') jiaofj, to_char(zuizsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') zuizsj, to_char(zuiwsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') zuiwsj, lingjbh, lingjmc, danw, yaohsl, baozxh, usxh, ucxh, ucrl, ucgs, fahd, to_char(faysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') faysj, to_char(shangxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') shangxsj, xiehd, xinxhd, cangkbh, zickbh, mudd, xinmdd, muddlx, yaohlzt, dingdh, dingdmxid, shengbr, yaohlsl, yaohllx, tongblshqj, tiaohbs, beiz, gongysdm, gongysmc, chej, shnagxfs, chanx, keh, peislb, jiaofzl, daijfsl, fifo, shiflsk, to_char(yaohlscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') yaohlscsj, to_char(xiughyjjfsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') xiughyjjfsj, jiaofzt, to_char(shijfysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') shijfysj, peizlssl, chengysdm,chengysmc, shifpz from ${dbSchemal4}ck_yaohl where 1=1

exchange-config.caption: 内部要货令(输出到执行层1，准备层)

reader.sql: SELECT YAOHLH, USERCENTER, XUNHBM, KANBKH, to_char(JIAOFJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as JIAOFJ, to_char(ZUIZSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIZSJ, to_char(ZUIWSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIWSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJMC, DANW, YAOHSL, BAOZXH, USXH, to_char(FAYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as FAYSJ, to_char(BEIHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as BEIHSJ, to_char(SHANGXSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHANGXSJ, CANGKBH, ZICKBH, XIEHD,MUDD, MUDDLX, YAOHLZT, DINGDH, SHENGBR, YAOHLSL, JIAOFLX, JIAOFZL, DAIJFSL, YAOHLLX, YAOHLLB, TONGBLSHQJ, BEIZ, XIAOHCH, TANGC, CHEX, CENG, SHIFGJ, SHIFSCBHD, SHIFDYUC, GONGYSDM, GONGYSMC, CHEJ, SHANGXFS, CHANX, KEH, PEISLB, SHIFLSK, to_char(YAOHLSCSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as YAOHLSCSJ, SHIFPZ, SUODPZ, PEIZLSSL, to_char(SHIJFYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHIJFYSJ, DINGDMXID FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAONBHL WHERE 1=1

select 'IMA' as ima, t.cangkbh || t.zickbh as tckbh, substr(t.chanx, 1, 3) as tchanx, t.lingjbh as lingjbh, y.cangkbh || y.zickbh as yckbh, (select distinct replace(replace(to_char(sum(beihsl), '99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') from ${dbSchemal4}ck_beihdmx where biaos != '2') as beihsl, (select distinct replace(replace(to_char(sum(keyljsl), '9999999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') from ${dbSchemal4}ck_usbq where BAOZZT = '4' or BAOZZT = '6') as keyljsl, (select distinct replace(replace(to_char(sum(lingjsl - keyljsl),'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') from ${dbSchemal4}ck_usbq where BAOZZT != '4' and BAOZZT != '6') as bksykc, '' as filler, t.danw as danw from ${dbSchemal4}ck_usbq t, ${dbSchemal4}ck_beihdmx y where t.ush = y.ush and t.cangklx = '3' and t.edit_time between (select end_time from ${dbSchemal4}in_time where in_id='OUT_1') and sysdate group by t.cangkbh, t.zickbh, t.chanx, t.lingjbh, y.cangkbh, y.zickbh, t.danw

SELECT 'FLUX'||to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddHh24mi') as flux, USERCENTER, LINGJBH, GONGYSDM, '+' || replace(replace(to_char(sum(LINGJSL), '99999.999'), '.', ''),' ','0') as LINGJSL, '+000000000' as n, DANW, CANGKBH || ZICKBH || '4' as ZCK from ${dbSchemal4}CK_USBQ where edit_time between (select end_time from ${dbSchemal4}in_time where in_id='OUT_2') and sysdate group by USERCENTER, LINGJBH, GONGYSDM, DANW, CANGKBH, ZICKBH

select 'A01' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, RUKLSH, UTH, BLH, to_char(BLSCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, CHANX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, RUKLX, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_RUKMX t where t.RUKLX = '1' or t.RUKLX = '2'

select 'A03' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, RUKLSH, UTH, ' ' BLH, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, CHANX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH||ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(RUKSJ,'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, RUKLX, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_RUKMX t WHERE t.RUKLX = '3'

select 'A01S' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, RUKLSH, UTH, BLH, to_char(BLSCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, CHANX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH||ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(RUKSJ,'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, RUKLX, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_RUKMX t WHERE t.RUKLX = '4'

select 'A08' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, ' ' BLH, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, ' ' PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_FANXD t

select 'A08S' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, ' ' BLH, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, ' ' PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_FANXD t

select 'A10' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, ' ' BLH, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, ' ' CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, ' ' PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_FANXD t

select 'A25' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, UTH, BLH, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, KUCSL LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_JIUFD t

select 'A25S' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, UTH, BLH, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, KUCSL LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_JIUFD t

select 'A35' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, t.keh XDJF, ' ' TWBB, t.pich JFM, ' ' PX, '4' HGBS, t.cangkbh||t.ZICKBH FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' CJJLH, ' ' USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, t.zhangh BLH, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, t.shifsl LINGJSL, DANW, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, ' ' CHENGYSMC, to_char(CHUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') DINGDH, ' ' ELH, t.USERCENTER PICH, ' ' CANGKBH, CANGKGLYZ CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(CHUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') JLHRQ, ELH CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_BEIHD t

select 'A36' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, to_char(CHUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') XDJF, ' ' TWBB, t.pich JFM, ' ' PX, '4' HGBS, t.cangkbh||t.ZICKBH FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' CJJLH, ' ' USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, t.zhangh BLH, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, t.shifsl LINGJSL, DANW, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, ' ' CHENGYSMC, to_char(CHUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') DINGDH, ' ' ELH, t.USERCENTER PICH, ' ' CANGKBH, ' ' CANGKBH2, CANGKGLYZ CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(CHUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') JLHRQ, ELH CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_BEIHD t

select 'A38' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, t.keh XDJF, ' ' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, t.cangkbh || t.ZICKBH HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, t.usercenter GYSLCBS, t.zhangh BLH, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, ' ' DANW, GONGYSDM, ' ' CHENGYSMC, to_char(CAOZSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') PICH, ' ' CANGKBH, t.pich CANGKBH2, ' ' RUKSJ from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_ZHENGCTK t

select 'A39' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, to_char(t.caozsj, 'YYYYMMDD') XDJF, ' ' TWBB, t.pich JFM, ' ' PX, ' ' HGBS, t.cangkbh || t.ZICKBH FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' CJJLH, ' ' USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, t.zhangh BLH, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, t.lingjsl LINGJSL, 'UN' DANW, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, ' ' CHENGYSMC, to_char(t.caozsj, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') DINGDH, ' ' ELH, t.USERCENTER PICH, ' ' CANGKBH, ' ' CANGKBH2, t.CANGKGLYZ CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(t.caozsj, 'YYYYMMDD') JLHRQ, t.elh CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_ZHENGCTK t

select 'A53' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, ' ' KBBS, ' ' XDJF, ' ' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, t.pich HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, to_char(t.weihsj, 'YYYYMMDD') CJJLH, t.cangkglyz USERCENTER, t.elh UTH, ' ' BLH, ' ' BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, t.SHIJUSSL LINGJSL, t.blh DANW, GONGYSDM, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') GONGYSLX, ' ' CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') ELH, t.CANGKBH || t.ZICKBH PICH, ' ' CANGKBH, substr(t.chanx, 0, 3) CANGKBH2, t.usercenter CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, ' ' JLHRQ, t.uth CANGKGLYZ, ' ' FILLER3 from ${dbSchemal4}IN_CK_PANDCY t

select 'AVX' as avx, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddHHmm') as jlhrq, cangkbh || zickbh as fcck, keh, substr(chanx, 1, 3) as chanx, lingjbh, danw, '+'||replace(replace(to_char(shifsl, '99999,999'), '.', ''),' ','0') as shifsl, bqh, '' as filler, dingdh, replace(replace(to_char((shifsl*lingjzl), '9999,999'), ',', ''),' ','0') as mz, kehljh, 'N+' as n, replace(replace(to_char(lingjzl,'99.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as lingjzl from ${dbSchemal4}in_cpk_lszbhd

SELECT lpad(rownum, 6, '0') JLLX, '000000' SCHMD, y.usercenter FSQDM, ' ' FSQHGM, ' ' FSQDZ, '78001H74' JSQDM, ' ' JSQHGM, ' ' JSQDZ, '00' FYSCSJ, '000000' FYNYR, '0000' FYSJ, ' ' XXLX, ' ' XXBB, ' ' FBXX, ' ' YZDLC, ' ' LHXXDM, ' ' XXJSR, 'Y' CALDELBS,
'00000000000000000' XXH, '36' XXDM, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddHH24MIss') RQSJ,
'006065393170900000' LJJSRDM, '10' JSRDMFZDLC,
'000254206547900272' SYRDM, '5' FYRDMFZDLC,
Y.GYSDM XSSDM, '5' XSSFZDLC, '78001H' SXSZM,
'3' SCSX,
Y.UCRL UCLJSL, Y.DANW UCLJSLDW, Y.UCGS YZBZSL,
Y.UCXH UCLX, '92' FZDLC, '1' BZJB,
Y.BAOZXH UMLX, '92' FZDLC2, '3' BZJB2,
Y.LINGJBH GMSLJH, Y.DINGDH DDH,
Y.XIEHD XHD,
Y.MUDD SHD,
Y.YAOHSL XJFSL, Y.DANW XJFSLDW, Y.JIAOFJ JFRQ, Y.ZUIZSJ ZZJFRQ, Y.ZUIWSJ ZWJFRQ, Y.YAOHLH ZLHKH, ' ' FYRSAFFIRDM, ' ' GMSDWBDM, ' ' FILLER
FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_EDI_YAOHL y
select YAOHLH, '+' ||replace(replace(to_char(yanssl, '99999999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as YANSSL, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as RUKSJ from ${dbSchemal4}in_rkfk

select t.t01a001 as jfdh, t.d04a001 as tch, y.b04a001 as um, z.a04a002 as lingjh, replace(to_char(b05ab02*(select count(b05ab01) from ${dbSchemal3}in_edi_fhtz_bzxx y),'99999999.99'),' ','0') as lingjsl from ${dbSchemal3}in_edi_fhtz_fyxx t, ${dbSchemal4}in_edi_fhtz_bzxx y, ${dbSchemal4}in_edi_fhtz_fymx z where t.t01a001 = y.t01a001 and t.t01a001 = z.t01a001

SELECT USERCENTER, JISZQ, DINGDH, HETH, DINGDLX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHULLX, DINGDZT, DINGDSXCZR, DINGDSXSJ, DINGDFSSJ, SHIFFSGYS, BEIZ, DINGDJSSJ, DINGDNR, ZIYHQRQ, FAHZQ, MAOXQBC, JISLX, SHIFZFSYHL, SHIFYJSYHL, ACTIVE FROM ${dbSchemal4}XQJS_DINGD WHERE DINGDZT='4' and SHIFYJSYHL='1'

select fhtzh, to_char(scsj, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as scsj, to_char(fssj, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as fssj, to_char(ddsj, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as ddsj, chenys, gongys, xiehd, kach, usercenter, lingjh, lingjmc, replace(to_char(lingjsl, '999999.99'), ' ', '') as lingjsl, yaohlh, rqxh, replace(to_char(rqsl, '999999.99'), ' ', '') as rqsl, replace(to_char(rqnljsl, '999999.99'), ' ', '') as rqnljsl, '' as filler from ${dbSchemal4}in_gevp_fhtz

select t.yaohlh as yaohlh, t.usercenter as usercenter, to_char(t.jiaofj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as jiaofj, to_char(t.zuizsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as zuizsj, to_char(t.zuiwsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as zuiwsj, t.lingjbh as tlingjbh, t.danw as tdanw, replace(replace(to_char(t.yaohsl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as yaohsl, t.baozxh as baozxh, replace(replace(to_char(t.usxh,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as usxh, t.ucxh as ucxh, replace(replace(to_char(t.ucrl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as ucrl, t.ucgs as ucgs, to_char(t.faysj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as faysj, t.xiehd as xiehd, t.mudd as mudd, t.dingdh as dingdh, t.yaohllx as yaohllx, t.tongblshqj as tongblshqj, t.chej as chej, t.shnagxfs as shnagxfs, t.chanx as chanx, t.keh as keh, t.peislb as peislb, to_char(t.yaohlscsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as yaohlscsj, y.lingjxh as lingjxh, y.zhengclsh as zhengclsh, to_char(y.zhengcsxsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as zhengcsxsj, y.weiz as weiz, y.lingjbh as ylingjbh, y.gongysdm as gongysdm, y.gongysmc as gongysmc, replace(replace(to_char(y.lingjsl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as lingjsl, y.danw as ydanw, z.wuldbh as wuldbh, z.shifjk as shifjk from ${dbSchemal3}in_efi_yaohl t, ${dbSchemal4}in_efi_tongbjpd y, ${dbSchemal4}in_efi_daowldsj z where t.yaohlh = y.yaohlh and t.usercenter = y.usercenter and t.yaohlh = z.yaohlh and t.usercenter = z.usercenter
select zzzx, lingjbh, yxbh, ddrq, '' as filler, replace(to_char(shul, '9999999'),' ','0') as shul, zfbj, hgbm, xianh, lyxt, usercenter from ${dbSchemal4}in_zcpc
